original_sentence: Cosine similarity measures how similar two sentences are in terms of their content and meaning, with a score ranging from -1 (completely dissimilar) to 1 (exactly similar)
rewrited_sentence: Cosine similarity captures the meaning-based similarity between sentences, ranging from -1 (completely different) to 1 (identical).
model_rewrited_prompt: Rewrite the following sentence, without change the overall meaning and semantic: """<original_sentence>""". Print just the text rewrited.
